exceptions.summary:
Thrown when the schema is not a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" /> or the resolution is not a
            <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.MapResolution" />.
Thrown when the resolved type is not assignable from <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2" />.
